page.title: 03FARMER'S YEAR IN MID ESSEX
page.content: This shows how work on an{arable farm is spread over a year.Dates are ap- proximate.{Weather}is the master.Mich- aelmas is the start of the farm year. {SEP}Plant Winter barley, cultivating, {OCT}Potato harvest, planting beans, First spraying for weeds. {NOV}More ploughing {DEC}Finish outside work,Winter holiday {JAN}Grade potatoes,maintenance of mac- hines and buildings,clean ditches. {FEB}Outside again,fertilizer on rape, 1st top dressing of barley. {MAR}Plant Spring barley and early pot- atoes, 2nd top dressing of barley. {APR}Plant main crop potatoes, 3rd top dressing of barley. {MAY}Spraying against fungus,disease and aphids. More maintenance work. {JUN}Slack time. Summer holiday. {JUL}Cut rape,spraying, harvest barley. {AUG}More spraying, harvest wheat.
